title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Call of Misery (Custom: read description)
description:
Call of Misery is a heavily extended Call of Chernobyl, a standalone sandbox mod for Stalker - Call of Pripyat. There is a heavy emphasis on immersion, survival, and relative realism. A few other mods have been added (listed below) to enhance the experience, while still retaining the challenge. Call of Misery is standalone and can be run directly by launching Stalker-CoC.exe, however a copy of Call of Pripyat is required for legal reasons.

Mods in this build:
-------------------
Call of Chernobyl 1.4.16 - Team EPIC
call of Misery 1.0d + English translation - MISERY Team
STCoM weapon pack + Fix 4 - Darryl123
Gore Mod 1.2 + Fix 2 - Kahvana
Enemies Don't Always Drop Broken Guns - STCoM Edition - crazycombine
STCom Low condition trading -Sonkorino
Scopes + Batteries Icons Distinction - Darvin76

Game config edits:
------------------
-Rebalanced stamina system: Sprinting is no longer as tiring when carrying a light load.
-Incremental health regen: Slowly heal over time as long as you are otherwise healthy.
-Rebalanced mutant's passive psi field range: 20-25M for all creatures, down from ~50M for some.
-Health reduced for the tankish mutants: They are still deadly as ever.

Installing
----------
Simply copy the folder anywhere and run Stalker-CoC.exe. DO NOT combine with your Call of Pripyat game, CoM is standalone and only needs Call of Pripyat installed on the system to have a valid CD key
